title: Ticket #198: Update the versions of the externals that the Windows build uses.
description: The Windows build is behind in the versions of the Externals that it uses. These need to be updated and/or revved to be compatible with the Windows build.
remarks:
2009-Feb-10 14:49:17 by tannenba:
Esp the gSOAP external on Windows needs to use the same version as on Unix ASAP.

2009-Feb-13 10:18:47 by burnett:
See [13919], [13921] and [13923] for changes.

2009-Feb-13 10:28:43 by burnett:
The gSOAP external build scripts were only changed in this commit to support the Windows build, its version was not updated. That is, its patch level went up one level. The *nix build remains the same.

2009-Apr-02 12:52:30 by burnett:
Updating from postgresql-8.0.2 to postgresql-8.3.0 broke the build for unknown reasons. Once 7.2.2 is out I'll take a closer look.

2009-Oct-21 15:41:29 by psilord:
Ben Burnett has left the Condor Project. This ticket is being unassigned.

2010-Oct-20 15:48:47 by jfrey:
In Condor 7.5.4, the only externals that are out-of-date on Windows are postgresql (8.0.2 vs 8.2.3-p1) and hadoop (0.20.0-p2 vs 0.20.2).
2010-Oct-20 15:59:08 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Jan-27 14:21:33 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 14:49:30 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
check_ins:

2009-Apr-01 11:54   Check-in [14349]: Ticket #198: Updated the versions of the externals that the Windows build uses and synched the *nix ones as well. (By Ben Burnett )
2009-Feb-13 09:58   Check-in [13921]: Revert "The original fix for the SOAP memory leak was erroneous." #198 This reverts commit 181359198572dc949ee228bbb20a8f7f27d2b9e5. (By Ben Burnett )
2009-Feb-13 09:44   Check-in [13923]: Merged [13920], Merge branch 'V7_2-branch' #198 Conflicts: msconfig/set_vars.bat (By Ben Burnett )
2009-Feb-13 09:40   Check-in [13919]: The Windows build now uses the latest gSOAP external #198 (By Ben Burnett )
creator: tannenba
